title: Novel Planner
description: Plan your novel without giving up your data. Serverless, uses browser storage to keep your content between sessions. Save the JSON file to switch between devices. No account necessary.

sections.content: A tool for planning a novel. Outline your chapters, track your characters, map your plot structure, and keep notes — all in the browser.

content: No Account Required: Open the page and start planning. No sign-up, no email, no password.
Browser Storage: Your work saves automatically between sessions on the same device.
JSON Export/Import: Download your entire novel plan as a JSON file. Load it on another device whenever you need to.
Zero Server Dependency: Nothing leaves your browser. If the internet goes down, your data is still there.

content.title: Open the App
content.text: No setup. No onboarding wizard. You land on your workspace immediately.

content.title: Build Your Structure
content.text: Create chapters, add scenes, define characters. The planner gives you a framework without forcing a method.

content.title: Write Your Notes
content.text: Each element has space for freeform notes. Use it however your brain works — bullet points, stream of consciousness, whatever.

content.title: Export When Ready
content.text: Save your plan as a JSON file. Back it up, move it to another machine, or just keep it safe.

sections.content: Most novel planning software wants your email, your money, or both. This one wants neither. Your story belongs to you.
